00068         MUXlisten(AtomicBoolean lock, NamedDB database, NamedDB info, Log _log) throws I2PException, IOException, RuntimeException {
00069                 try {
00070                         int port = 0;
00071                         InetAddress host = null;
00072                         this.lock = lock;
00073                         this.tg = null;
00074                         this.database = database;
00075                         this.info = info;
00076                         this._log = _log;
00077                         lives = new AtomicBoolean(false);
00078 
00079                         this.database.getWriteLock();
00080                         this.info.getWriteLock();
00081                         this.info.add("STARTING", new Boolean(true));
00082                         this.info.releaseWriteLock();
00083                         this.database.releaseWriteLock();
00084                         this.database.getReadLock();
00085                         this.info.getReadLock();
00086 
00087                         N = this.info.get("NICKNAME").toString();
00088                         prikey = new ByteArrayInputStream((byte[]) info.get("KEYS"));
00089                         // Make a new copy so that anything else won't muck with our database.
00090                         Properties R = (Properties) info.get("PROPERTIES");
00091                         Properties Q = new Properties();
00092                         Lifted.copyProperties(R, Q);
00093                         this.database.releaseReadLock();
00094                         this.info.releaseReadLock();
00095 
00096                         this.database.getReadLock();
00097                         this.info.getReadLock();
00098                         this.go_out = info.exists("OUTPORT");
00099                         this.come_in = info.exists("INPORT");
00100                         if (this.come_in) {
00101                                 port = Integer.parseInt(info.get("INPORT").toString());
00102                                 host = InetAddress.getByName(info.get("INHOST").toString());
00103                         }
00104                         this.database.releaseReadLock();
00105                         this.info.releaseReadLock();
00106 
00107                         if (this.come_in) {
00108                                 this.listener = new ServerSocket(port, backlog, host);
00109                         }
00110                         socketManager = I2PSocketManagerFactory.createManager(prikey, Q);
00111                 // I2PException, IOException, RuntimeException
00112                 // To bad we can't just catch and enumerate....
00113                 // } catch (I2PException e) {
00114                 // Something went bad.
00115                 //      this.database.getWriteLock();
00116                 //      this.info.getWriteLock();
00117                 //      this.info.add("STARTING", new Boolean(false));
00118                 //      this.info.releaseWriteLock();
00119                 //      this.database.releaseWriteLock();
00120                 //      throw new I2PException(e);
00121                 } catch (IOException e) {
00122                         // Something went bad.
00123                         this.database.getWriteLock();
00124                         this.info.getWriteLock();
00125                         this.info.add("STARTING", new Boolean(false));
00126                         this.info.releaseWriteLock();
00127                         this.database.releaseWriteLock();
00128                         throw new IOException(e.toString());
00129                 } catch (RuntimeException e) {
00130                         // Something went bad.
00131                         this.database.getWriteLock();
00132                         this.info.getWriteLock();
00133                         this.info.add("STARTING", new Boolean(false));
00134                         this.info.releaseWriteLock();
00135                         this.database.releaseWriteLock();
00136                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00137                 } catch (Exception e) {
00138                         // Something else went bad.
00139                         this.database.getWriteLock();
00140                         this.info.getWriteLock();
00141                         this.info.add("STARTING", new Boolean(false));
00142                         this.info.releaseWriteLock();
00143                         this.database.releaseWriteLock();
00144                         e.printStackTrace();
00145                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00146                 }
00147         }
00148 
00149         private void rlock() throws Exception {
00150                 database.getReadLock();
00151                 info.getReadLock();
00152         }
00153 
00154         private void runlock() throws Exception {
00155                 database.releaseReadLock();
00156                 info.releaseReadLock();
00157         }
00158 
00159         private void wlock() throws Exception {
00160                 database.getWriteLock();
00161                 info.getWriteLock();
00162         }
00163 
00164         private void wunlock() throws Exception {
00165                 info.releaseWriteLock();
00166                 database.releaseWriteLock();
00167         }

00173         public void run() {
00174                 I2PServerSocket SS = null;
00175                 Thread t = null;
00176                 Thread q = null;
00177                 try {
00178                         try {
00179                                 wlock();
00180                                 try {
00181                                         info.add("RUNNING", new Boolean(true));
00182                                 } catch (Exception e) {
00183                                         lock.set(false);
00184                                         wunlock();
00185                                         return;
00186                                 }
00187                         } catch (Exception e) {
00188                                 lock.set(false);
00189                                 return;
00190                         }
00191                         try {
00192                                 wunlock();
00193                         } catch (Exception e) {
00194                                 lock.set(false);
00195                                 return;
00196                         }
00197 //              socketManager.addDisconnectListener(new DisconnectListener());
00198                         lives.set(true);
00199                         lock.set(false);
00200                         quit:
00201                         {
00202                                 try {
00203                                         tg = new ThreadGroup(N);
00204                                         {
00205                                                 // toss the connections to a new threads.
00206                                                 // will wrap with TCP and UDP when UDP works
00207 
00208                                                 if (go_out) {
00209                                                         // I2P -> TCP
00210                                                         SS = socketManager.getServerSocket();
00211                                                         I2Plistener conn = new I2Plistener(SS, socketManager, info, database, _log, lives);
00212                                                         t = new Thread(tg, conn, "BOBI2Plistener " + N);
00213                                                         t.start();
00214                                                 }
00215 
00216                                                 if (come_in) {
00217                                                         // TCP -> I2P
00218                                                         TCPlistener conn = new TCPlistener(listener, socketManager, info, database, _log, lives);
00219                                                         q = new Thread(tg, conn, "BOBTCPlistener " + N);
00220                                                         q.start();
00221                                                 }
00222 
00223                                                 try {
00224                                                         wlock();
00225                                                         try {
00226                                                                 info.add("STARTING", new Boolean(false));
00227                                                         } catch (Exception e) {
00228                                                                 wunlock();
00229                                                                 break quit;
00230                                                         }
00231                                                 } catch (Exception e) {
00232                                                         break quit;
00233                                                 }
00234                                                 try {
00235                                                         wunlock();
00236                                                 } catch (Exception e) {
00237                                                         break quit;
00238                                                 }
00239                                                 boolean spin = true;
00240                                                 while (spin && lives.get()) {
00241                                                         try {
00242                                                                 Thread.sleep(1000); //sleep for 1 second
00243                                                         } catch (InterruptedException e) {
00244                                                                 break quit;
00245                                                         }
00246                                                         try {
00247                                                                 rlock();
00248                                                                 try {
00249                                                                         spin = info.get("STOPPING").equals(Boolean.FALSE);
00250                                                                 } catch (Exception e) {
00251                                                                         runlock();
00252                                                                         break quit;
00253                                                                 }
00254                                                         } catch (Exception e) {
00255                                                                 break quit;
00256                                                         }
00257                                                         try {
00258                                                                 runlock();
00259                                                         } catch (Exception e) {
00260                                                                 break quit;
00261                                                         }
00262                                                 }
00263                                         } // die
00264 
00265                                 } catch (Exception e) {
00266                                         // System.out.println("MUXlisten: Caught an exception" + e);
00267                                         break quit;
00268                                 }
00269                         } // quit
00270                 } finally {
00271                         lives.set(false);
00272                         // Some grace time.
00273                         try {
00274                                 Thread.sleep(100);
00275                         } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
00276                         }
00277                         try {
00278                                 wlock();
00279                                 try {
00280                                         info.add("STARTING", new Boolean(false));
00281                                         info.add("STOPPING", new Boolean(true));
00282                                         info.add("RUNNING", new Boolean(false));
00283                                 } catch (Exception e) {
00284                                         lock.set(false);
00285                                         wunlock();
00286                                         return;
00287                                 }
00288                                 wunlock();
00289                         } catch (Exception e) {
00290                         }
00291                         // Start cleanup.
00292                         while (!lock.compareAndSet(false, true)) {
00293                                 // wait
00294                         }
00295                         if (SS != null) {
00296                                 try {
00297                                         SS.close();
00298                                 } catch (I2PException ex) {
00299                                 }
00300                         }
00301                         if (listener != null) {
00302                                 try {
00303                                         listener.close();
00304                                 } catch (IOException e) {
00305                                 }
00306                         }
00307 
00308                         // Some grace time.
00309                         try {
00310                                 Thread.sleep(100);
00311                         } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
00312                         }
00313 
00314                         // zero out everything.
00315                         try {
00316                                 wlock();
00317                                 try {
00318                                         info.add("STARTING", new Boolean(false));
00319                                         info.add("STOPPING", new Boolean(false));
00320                                         info.add("RUNNING", new Boolean(false));
00321                                 } catch (Exception e) {
00322                                         lock.set(false);
00323                                         wunlock();
00324                                         return;
00325                                 }
00326                                 wunlock();
00327                         } catch (Exception e) {
00328                         }
00329 
00330                         lock.set(false); // Should we force waiting for all threads??
00331 
00332                         // Wait around till all threads are collected.
00333                         if (tg != null) {
00334                                 String boner = tg.getName();
00335                                 // System.out.println("BOB: MUXlisten: Starting thread collection for: " + boner);
00336                                 _log.warn("BOB: MUXlisten: Starting thread collection for: " + boner);
00337                                 // tg.interrupt(); // give my stuff a small smack again.
00338                                 if (tg.activeCount() + tg.activeGroupCount() != 0) {
00339                                         // visit(tg, 0, boner);
00340                                         int foo = tg.activeCount() + tg.activeGroupCount();
00341                                         // hopefully no longer needed!
00342                                         // int bar = lives;
00343                                         // System.out.println("BOB: MUXlisten: Waiting on threads for " + boner);
00344                                         // System.out.println("\nBOB: MUXlisten: ThreadGroup dump BEGIN " + boner);
00345                                         // visit(tg, 0, boner);
00346                                         // System.out.println("BOB: MUXlisten: ThreadGroup dump END " + boner + "\n");
00347                                         // Happily spin forever :-(
00348                                         while (foo != 0) {
00349                                                 foo = tg.activeCount() + tg.activeGroupCount();
00350                                                 // if (lives != bar && lives != 0) {
00351                                                 //      System.out.println("\nBOB: MUXlisten: ThreadGroup dump BEGIN " + boner);
00352                                                 //      visit(tg, 0, boner);
00353                                                 //      System.out.println("BOB: MUXlisten: ThreadGroup dump END " + boner + "\n");
00354                                                 // }
00355                                                 // bar = lives;
00356                                                 try {
00357                                                         Thread.sleep(100); //sleep for 100 ms (One tenth second)
00358                                                 } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
00359                                                         // nop
00360                                                 }
00361                                         }
00362                                 }
00363                                 // System.out.println("BOB: MUXlisten: Threads went away. Success: " + boner);
00364                                 _log.warn("BOB: MUXlisten: Threads went away. Success: " + boner);
00365                                 tg.destroy();
00366                                 // Zap reference to the ThreadGroup so the JVM can GC it.
00367                                 tg = null;
00368                         }
00369                         try {
00370                                 socketManager.destroySocketManager();
00371                         } catch (Exception e) {
00372                                 // nop
00373                         }
00374 
00375                 }
00376         }

00379         // Debugging... None of this is normally used.
00384         private void visitAllThreads() {
00385                 ThreadGroup root = Thread.currentThread().getThreadGroup().getParent();
00386                 while (root.getParent() != null) {
00387                         root = root.getParent();
00388                 }
00389 
00390                 // Visit each thread group
00391                 visit(root, 0, root.getName());
00392         }
00393 
00399         private static void visit(ThreadGroup group, int level, String tn) {
00400                 // Get threads in `group'
00401                 int numThreads = group.activeCount();
00402                 Thread[] threads = new Thread[numThreads * 2];
00403                 numThreads = group.enumerate(threads, false);
00404                 String indent = "------------------------------------".substring(0, level) + "-> ";
00405                 // Enumerate each thread in `group' and print it.
00406                 for (int i = 0; i < numThreads; i++) {
00407                         // Get thread
00408                         Thread thread = threads[i];
00409                         System.out.println("BOB: MUXlisten: " + tn + ": " + indent + thread.toString());
00410                 }
00411 
00412                 // Get thread subgroups of `group'
00413                 int numGroups = group.activeGroupCount();
00414                 ThreadGroup[] groups = new ThreadGroup[numGroups * 2];
00415                 numGroups = group.enumerate(groups, false);
00416 
00417                 // Recursively visit each subgroup
00418                 for (int i = 0; i < numGroups; i++) {
00419                         visit(groups[i], level + 1, groups[i].getName());
00420                 }
00421         }
00422 }
